articles.description: Microsoft is a data-driven company, harvesting telemetry and user data on a scale we can scarcely imagine. Is that information reliable enough, though?
articles.content:
Source: Windows Central
This article is unscientific. I don't have any data to back up my claims. And indeed, the opposite of my claims could very well be true. I'm also in a very easy position. My … [+9189 chars]

articles.author: Anuj Bhatia
articles.title: Microsoft Surface Laptop Go review: The compact notebook for writers and journalists - The Indian Express
articles.description: The fact that it’s small and lightweight, and also has a full-size keyboard, and is powerful enough to get the work done makes the Surface Laptop Go winner for writers and journalists.
articles.content: I spend most of my time in front of the laptop, even when I am not working. While testing the new Surface Laptop Go last week, I had one important thing on my mind: is the small form factor of this l… [+6004 chars]
